October 21, 2025 
 
Michael Spalter 
88 Williams Street 
Providence, RI 02909 
 
This letter shall stand as certification that a Burglar and Fire, 
Protective Signaling, Alarm System has been installed and is in 
good working order on the premise at:  
 
88 Williams Street, Providence, RI 
Original installation date: June 14, 2004 
 
           System Description:  Multiple zone, U.L. Listed, 
           Burglar/Fire alarm control/communicator with standby 
           battery for backup power and audible sirens for alarm  
           sounding during alarm activation conditions.  
 
 Burglar Alarm:  Protection consists of alarm contacts on        
exterior doors and windows with interior motion 
detection units deployed throughout the home. 
 Fire Alarm: Photoelectric smoke and heat detection units 
are connected to the alarm system and monitored at the 
central station. 
 Environmental Alarm: Multiple low temperature devices 
set to detect 45 degrees and water detection devices are 
connected to the alarm system and monitored at the 
central station. 
 
            The above described alarm system is connected for 24 hour  
            Central Station Monitoring via dual LTE cellular network 
            communication at our Central Station facility.  
 
This alarm system automatically tests into the central station 
on a continual basis to ensure “on line” status.  The system is 
under contract for central station alarm monitoring and 
technical service.  
 
Richard

Contractor Invoice Template
Header
Contractor's business name, logo, license number (if applicable), address, phone, email, and website (if any)
Invoice Details
Invoice number, issue date, due date, project/job number (if relevant)
Client Information
Client's name, service address, billing address (if different), phone, email
Project Description
Brief summary of the work performed or service provided, with project location and timeline (start/end dates)
Itemized Charges
Table listing: description, quantity, unit price, labor hours/rate, materials, equipment rental, subcontractors,
etc.
Subtotal
Total before taxes, fees, or discounts
Discounts (optional)
Any agreed-upon discounts (e.g., loyalty, early payment)
Taxes & Fees
Applicable sales tax, permits, service fees, delivery charges, etc.
Total Amount Due
Final amount payable (highlighted clearly)
Payment Terms
Accepted payment methods (check, bank transfer, card), due date, late fees or interest, deposit policy if
ongoing work
Contractor Invoice Template
Notes/Disclaimers
Optional: warranty information, lien waiver info, disclaimers (e.g., 'client responsible for permits'), or next
project steps
Signature Line (optional)
For client approval or acknowledgment (especially useful for larger or multi-stage projects)

At Smart Haven Lifestyle, SHL, we're passionate about redefining the way you experience your
environment.
We believe that technology should effortlessly enhance your life, making it more convenient, efficient, and
secure.
With a deep commitment to innovation, our team of experts are dedicated to crafting smart home
solutions that blend seamlessly with your lifestyle. From intelligent lighting and shades, and climate control
to surveillance systems, we bring the future of living directly to your doorstep.
Our mission is to empower you with the tools to transform your home or office into a truly Smart Home
system, where every room is a hub of comfort, control, and connectivity. The smart home system can
adjust the lighting, temperature, and music to create the perfect ambiance for a relaxing evening at home
or a productive day at the office.
Welcome to a world where your environment works for you, and welcome to Smart Haven Lifestyle.
Lutron Ketra, Lighting Control & Shades Budgeting Pro

Anne and Michael Spalter have contracted Forest*Care to prepare a management plan on their 
property at 1910 Sunset Lake Road and 22 Kelly Road for a total of approximately 71 forested acres 
in Dummerston and Brattleboro, VT.   
These management plans will meet or exceed the standards set forth by the Vermont Department 
of Forests, Parks and Recreation for enrollment in the Use Value Appraisal program. 
The cost of both forest management plans will be $2,400.00.  Upon signing this contract, a down 
payment of $700.00 needs to be sent to Forest*Care.    
The deadline for creating the plan is October 1, 2025.
